name: MBT Testimonial
author: Mehmood Baig Mughal

sections.description:
MBT Testimonial Slider is a fully Responsive & mobile friendly WordPress plugin to manage your client Testimonials.

How To Use It.

Default shortcode is [mbt_testimonial]

If you make category then you need to mention category name

[mbt_testimonial category=”abc”]
sections.installation:
Just install from your WordPress “Plugins > Add New” screen and all will be well. Manual installation is very straightforward as well:

  1. Upload the zip file and unzip it in the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to MBT Testimonial to create testimonial slides.
sections.faq:
How to Use MBT Testimonial Slider

Go to MBT Testimonial on Dashboard
Add New.
Add Category.

How to show MBT Testimonial Slider on page

Use shortcode [mbt_testimonial].
If you are divide MBT Testimonial Slider in category than use shortcode like this [mbt_testimonial category=”frontpage”].
